content:
Direction: Read the e-mail below.
From: Jennifer Watson
To: Slick Shoes Customer Support
Subject: Wrong Order Received
Dear Customer Support,
I recently ordered a pair of black, high-heeled shoes from your website. However, I received a pair of work boots instead. Could you help me get the correct order?
Thank you,
Jennifer Watson
Directions: Respond to the e-mail, as if you are a representative at the customer support. In your e-mail, give ONE piece of information and make TWO requests.

Direction: Read the e-mail below.
From: Tony Anderson
To: Deena Thompson
Subject: Items Needed for Upcoming Meeting
Dear Deena,
As you know, representatives from our Malaysian branch will be visiting for an important meeting. There might be a presentation during this meeting. Could you let me know what items youâ€™ll need for it?
Please get back to me at your earliest convenience.
Regards,
Tony
Directions: Respond to the e-mail as if you are a staff member in the company. In your e-mail, make ONE request and give TWO pieces of information.

Item3.content: Do you agree or disagree with the following statement: A good leader must have a strong team to be successful. Give reasons and examples to support your opinion.
